vocabinfos.mediumDef:
§ Jabesh = "dry"
n pr loc
This name is used for:
1) a town in the territory of Gilead; according to Eusebius, it is beyond the Jordan, 6 miles (10 km) from Pella, on the mountain road to Gerasa; site unknown but may be modern 'Wadi Yabes'
n pr m
2) father of Shallum, the 15th king of the northern kingdom
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (2a)   ciudad; Galaad; (2b)   padre de Salum, rey de Israel
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
雅比 这个字在原文的意思是 "乾地"
專有名詞 地名
1) 在基列領土中的一個城鎮; 依據優西比烏(Eusebius)的記載,
此地在約旦以北, 距 Pella 六英哩(十公里), 在往 Gerasa 的山路
上; 確實地點不詳, 但可能是現今的 'Wadi Yabes'
陽性專有名詞
2) 北國以色列的第十五個王沙龍的父親 (王下 15:10,13,14)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
雅比 这个字在原文的意思是 "干地"
专有名词 地名
1) 在基列领土中的一个城镇; 依据优西比乌(Eusebius)的记载,
此地在约旦以北, 距 Pella 六英哩(十公里), 在往 Gerasa 的山路
上; 确实地点不详, 但可能是现今的 'Wadi Yabes'
阳性专有名词
2) 北国以色列的第十五个王沙龙的父亲 (王下 15:10,13,14)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the Kingdom of Israel, living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Ki.15.10;
father of: Shallum (H7967)
§ Jabesh = "dry"
n pr loc
1) a town in the territory of Gilead; according to Eusebius, it is beyond the Jordan, 6 miles (10 km) from Pella, on the mountain road to Gerasa; site unknown but may be modern 'Wadi Yabes'
n pr m
2) father of Shallum, the 15th king of the northern kingdom

Another name of ya.vesh (יָבֵשׁ "Jabesh" H3003)

2) father of Shallum, the 15th king of the northern kingdom
